As our last edition proved very satisfactory, we are quite confident that the present volume will be still more so, it containing more information, and no expense, time, or labor being spared to make it most accurate. In the Miscellaneous Directory will be found the names of the new officers of the various societies, etc. In due time our canvassers will call' on you for the renewal of your; patronage.
